import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './Sellbook.css' import { Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Sellbook() { const [preview,setPreview] = useState("") const [bookDetails,setBookDetails] = useState({ bookname:"",author:"",price:"",bookImage:"" }) const handleclose = () =>{ setBookDetails({ bookname:"",author:"",price:"",bookImage:"" }) setPreview("") } const handlesell = () =>{ } useEffect(()=>{ if(bookDetails.bookImage){ setPreview(URL.createObjectURL(bookDetails.bookImage)) } },[bookDetails.bookImage]) return ( <>

Book Name :

setBookDetails({...bookDetails,bookname:e.target.value})} />

Author:

setBookDetails({...bookDetails,author:e.target.value})} />

Price :

setBookDetails({...bookDetails,price:e.target.value})} />
) } export default Sellbook
